title: Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       What's the best way to stay connected? Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument provides a few different ways for you to stay connected to what is happening around the monument. These options allow you to choose how you want to be informed, and how often you want to be informed.      News Releases   Visit our News Releases page to view the latest news and events from Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument.   Facebook     "Like" Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument on Facebook and get more than just News Releases delivered to your personal News Feed in Facebook. We share exciting content and events as they happen. Start following today!
